TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ProfileAuthenticationOption extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Describes the authentication type of user profiles to be searched.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The ProfileAuthenticationOption enumeration is used by profile providers and the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager> class when they search for profiles in the data source and when they delete them. The ProfileAuthenticationOption enumeration is used to select whether only anonymous, only authenticated, or all profiles are searched.
## Examples The following code example allows a user to view and delete active and inactive profiles information based on search criteria including a ProfileAuthenticationOption parameter.
> [!IMPORTANT] > This example includes a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
[!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager#5](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.web.profile.pro_6_1.aspx)] [!code-cs[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager#5](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.web.profile.pro_6_1.aspx)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption All = int32(2)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption Anonymous = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption Authenticated = int32(1)
